title: Draft a Purchase Offer
description: A buyer client wants to make an offer on a property. The agent needs to draft the purchase agreement.

tasks.description: Confirm the offer terms with the buyer (price, financing, contingencies, closing date).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear, documented list of all offer terms provided by the buyer.

tasks.description: Fill out the state-approved purchase agreement form with all the offer terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: The purchase agreement is accurately filled out with all buyer and offer details.

tasks.description: Send the completed offer to the buyer for their signature using an e-signature service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The offer document is sent to the buyer via an e-signature platform.
